p: At 2 weeks post-inoculation, germ cells were necrotic and inflammatory cells, including neutrophils, had infiltrated into the testicular interstitium in PRVABC59- and ChibaS36-infected mice ( Fig 7A, 7C, 7G, and 7I). At 6 weeks post-infection, the testes of PRVABC59-infected mice were atrophic and most germ cells were not observed in the testis ( Fig 8A). The ZIKV NS1 antigen was detected in the seminiferous tubules and epididymal fluid of PRVABC59- and ChibaS36-infected mice at 2 weeks post-inoculation ( Fig 7B, 7D, 7F, 7H, 7J and 7L), whereas the antigen was only detected in the epididymides of PRVABC59-infected mice at 6 weeks post-inoculation ( Fig 8D).
